es.eurohelp.lod.aldapa.storage

Interface RDFStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TestsMemoryRDFStore

    public interface RDFStore
    An RDF store is anything that stores RDF: Triple Store, memory store, NoSQL DB, file store, etc.
    Author:
    Mikel Egana Aranguren, Eurohelp S.L.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteGraph(String graphUri)
      Deletes all the triples of a named graph
      boolean execSPARQLBooleanQuery(String pSPARQLquery)
      Executes a SPARQL query that will return, if successful, either true or false (ASK)
      org.eclipse.rdf4j.query.GraphQueryResult execSPARQLGraphQuery(String pSPARQLquery)
      Executes a SPARQL query that will return, if successful, a set of RDF statements and their Graph (context), if any
      org.eclipse.rdf4j.query.TupleQueryResult execSPARQLTupleQuery(String pSPARQLquery)
      Executes a SPARQL query that will return, if successful, a set of bindings (results as variables and associated entities)
      void flushGraph(String graphURI, FileOutputStream outputstream, org.eclipse.rdf4j.rio.RDFFormat rdfformat)
      Writes the content of a graph into an RDF file
      void saveModel(org.eclipse.rdf4j.model.Model model)
      Loads RDF data into an RDF store
      void startRDFStore()
      Start RDF store (allocate resources, probably configure, and start store)
      void stopRDFStore()
      Stop RDF store (close gracefully and liberate resources)

      • flushGraph

        void flushGraph(String graphURI,
                FileOutputStream outputstream,
                org.eclipse.rdf4j.rio.RDFFormat rdfformat)
         throws RDFStoreException
        Writes the content of a graph into an RDF file
        Parameters:
        graphUri - the URI of the Graph containing the triples
        outputstream - the file to write to
        format - the format of the RDF file: JSONLD, RDFXML, etc.
        Throws:
        an - RDF Store exception
        RDFStoreException
